title: How to Fry Ham

steps.headline: Put a bit of butter, oil, or lard in your frying pan.
Heat the butter, oil, or lard for about 30 seconds, or until it starts to slightly bubble.
Put in your slice of ham.
steps.description: Start with one if you are a beginner cook, or if your pan is small.

steps.headline: Let it sit for about 30 seconds, but keep an eye on it by lifting it up with a spatula.
Once a little brown, flip it over and repeat step 5.
Put a bit of butter, oil, or lard in your frying pan.
Heat the butter, oil, or lard for about 30 seconds, or until it starts to slightly bubble.
Put a handful of the ham pieces in.
Stir it constantly with a wooden spoon or spatula for about one minute.

Heat the butter, oil, or lard for about 30 seconds, or until it starts to slightly bubble.  Put a handful of the ham pieces in.  Stir it constantly with a wooden spoon or spatula for about one minute.
